hibernate-mapping.query: select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join dd.egDemandReason dr left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A' and dd.amount > 0 and ptd.egInstallmentMaster = :installment and dr.egInstallmentMaster.finYearRange <> :finYear

select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join dd.egDemandReason dr left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A' and dd.amount > 0 and ptd.egInstallmentMaster = :installment

select ptd from Ptdemand ptd inner join ptd.egptProperty p inner join p.basicProperty bp where bp.active = true and (p.status = 'A' or p.status = 'I' or p.status = 'W') and bp = :basicProperty and ptd.egInstallmentMaster = :installment
select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A'

select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A' and dd.amount = 0

select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A' and dd.amount >= 0

select dd from Ptdemand ptd left join ptd.egDemandDetails dd left join ptd.egptProperty p left join p.basicProperty bp where bp = :basicProperty and bp.active = true and p.status = 'A' and dd.amount > 0 and ptd.egInstallmentMaster = :installment
